subject: Add buxton user creation to spec
commitMessage:
Add buxton user creation to spec

This is necessary for the initial DB's to be created
properly, and for the service to run as 'buxton'

Change-Id: Id084518850a8bcfd694bb0952cab5526f3dcc92e

comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

I added the buxton user/group to the 'setup' package back in March:

https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/#/c/18181/

That change is present in the current setup package from Tizen:Common.

If you are not using the setup package, I can see why this change would be needed...

Patch Set 1:

I think it's better to have it here, too, since 
on the Intel side of things we're largely installing Buxton into pre-existing Tizen Mobile images, rather than creating new ones.

Also, I do not think it does any harm, regardless.
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

The SR (Submit Request) has been accepted to OBS Tizen:IVI project.
- Package: buxton
- Reviewer: bartosh
- Comments: SR 28685 is set to acceptedYour submission has been accepted into Tizen IVI project.
-
After rebuild your package(s) will end up in the latest IVI snapshot repositories:
i586 atom repository: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/latest/repos/atom/
i586 emulator repository: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/latest/repos/emulator/
-
You can find latest snapshot images in the latest IVI snapshot repository:
i586 EFI image: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/latest/images/atom/ivi-efi-i586/
i586 MBR image: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/latest/images/atom/ivi-mbr-i586/
i586 MBR emulator image: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/latest/images/emulator/ivi-mbr-i586-emul/
-
Your package(s) will be included into the next daily release.
-
Thanks,
Tizen Release Engineering Team

subject: Fix double memory free in db_for_resource
commitMessage:
Fix double memory free in db_for_resource

Double free causes due path already has cleanup attribute.
It's gcc specific, but such attribute uses in another places.

Origin: upstream, https://github.com/sofar/buxton/commit/265fc51c
Change-Id: I8d590cedb455ea62334ab95840a68cd778d0b5da
Signed-off-by: Alexey Perevalov <a.perevalov@samsung.com>
Signed-off-by: Patrick McCarty <patrick.mccarty@linux.intel.com>

comments.message: Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.
